• HTML5 web game with multiplayer mining and building mechanics
  • Real-time multiplayer via MQTT broker for player synchronization
  • Mobile-optimized controls with touch support and adaptive UI
  • Procedural world generation with layered terrain and ore distribution
  • Save system with local IndexedDB storage and cloud sync via Puter
  • Admin features including player management and world control
  • Shop system for upgrades, consumables, and vehicle customization
  • Day/night cycle, minimap, and particle effects for visual polish

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time player synchronization, procedural world generation, and cross-platform support. Players dig for resources, build structures, trade with others, and manage upgrades in a persistent shared world. The game includes a robust save system, admin controls, and mobile-optimized touch controls for accessibility.
